data.text: Ndiela yimbidila luzolo luaku ayi busongaÂ ;
Ndiela lubaka mu diatila mu luzingu lukambulu tsembolo.
Ndilendi tula ko va ntuala meso mama
Batu badi mintima mi mbimbi thama bela kuthatukila
Woso wuntubidila mutu fikimini yandi mu kinsueki,
Meso mama mela ba va mikhuikizi
Kadika nsuka, ndiela tula dio sui
